title: Yaaro Ivan Lyrics Udhayam NH4 Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song :Yaaro Ivan
Singer: GV Prakash, Saindhavi
Music : G. V. Prakash Kumar
Movie: Udhayam NH 4
Lyrics: Na MuthuKumar
Other Songs Lyrics
Ora Kannala
Yaaro Ivan
Maalai Pon Maalai
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words

Yaaro ivan Yaaro ivan
en pookalin vero ivan
en penmayayai vendraan ivan
anbaanavan (2)

Un kadhalil karaikindravan
un paarvayil uraikindravan
un padhayil nizhalagave
varukindravan

en kodayil mazhaiyanavan
en vaadayil veyilaanavan
kan jaadayil en thevayai
arivaan ivan

Engae unnai kootil chella
solvai undhan kadhal mella
En penmayum ilaipaarave
un marbiley idam podhumey

Yen indru idaiveli kuraikiradhey
medhuvaaga idhayangal inaikiradhey

Un swasangal ennai theendinaal
en naanangal yen thorkudho
Un vaasanai varum velayil
en yosanai yen maarudho

Nadhiyinil oru ilai vilukiradhey
Alaigalil midhandhadhu thavalkiradhey
karai seruma un kai seruma
edhirgaalamaey

enkaagave pirandhaan ivan
ennai kaakkave varuvaan ivan
en penmayai vendraan ivan
anbaanavan.

en kodayil mazhaiyanavan
en vaadayil veyilaanavan
kan jaadayil en thevayai
arivaan ivanEnglish Translation
